revised_title: Impedance Change in Thin Plates with Cracks: Analytical and Numerical Solutions
tldr: The authors present a method for calculating the change in coil impedance due to a through-thickness crack in a thin conducting plate. They represent the crack using a distribution of generalized current vortices and derive an expression for the change in coil impedance. Analytical and numerical results are provided for specific cases, demonstrating the effectiveness of the thin-plate model in predicting impedance changes in cracked components.
